overview: he film deals with transformation in the African American community. With all the violence going on in Chicago, we (my dad and I) documented a proven solution to end violence in Chicago and in African American/Latino communities across the country. We took one of Chicago most violent and popular drug spots and flipped it in 6 weeks into a productive and peaceful community. People everywhere is asking whats the solution to the violence and police brutality? Where here it is.
title: Chicago: My Block My Responsibility
